General.Name: Shanghai Hi-Road Food Technology Co. Ltd.
General.Description: Shanghai Hi-Road Food Technology Co., Ltd. researches, develops, produces, and sells bakery food ingredients in China and internationally. The company's products include cream, jam, chocolate, edible oil, compound sauce, walrus food ingredients, and catering series. It operates in baking, food, and home baking industries. Shanghai Hi-Road Food Technology Co., Ltd. was founded in 2003 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
